name: Grand March of Full Bloom, Lianorn
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/Turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and call it to (RC) or discard it.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1] & discard a card from hand], and boost this unit with all of your back row [Stand] units with "Boost". If you boosted this unit with three or more units, this unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle, and at the end of that battle, choose two of your back row rear-guards, and [Stand] them.
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS06] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 06: Master Deckset -Urara Haneyama-

name: Brilliant Tune, Rektina
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with "Lianorn" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a grade 1 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC).
[CONT](RC):If your back row has three or more rear-guards, this unit gets "Boost".
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS06] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 06: Master Deckset -Urara Haneyama-

name: Budding of Pleasant Sounds, Gracia
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Brilliant Tune, Rektina", you may call this card to (RC).
[CONT](RC):During the battle this unit boosted a vanguard, this unit gets [Power]+5000.
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS06] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 06: Master Deckset -Urara Haneyama-

name: Announcing Wind of Spring, Corphie

productName: [VGE-DZ-SS06] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 06: Master Deckset -Urara Haneyama-

name: Marche Fleur, Lianorn Vivace
effect:
UnisonDress - [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from a unit in the UnisonDress state or a unit with "Lianorn" in its different card name from this unit, draw a card, and this unit is in the UnisonDress state until end of this fight.
[AUTO](VC)[1/Turn]:When this unit in the UnisonDress state attacks while not boosted, [Stand] all of your rear-guards, and boost this unit with them. If you boosted with three or more units, at the end of that battle, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose three of your units, [Stand] them, and they get [Power]+5000/drive -1 until end of turn. (Rear-guards without "Boost" can boost too)
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS06] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 06: Master Deckset -Urara Haneyama-

name: Resonance Dragon
effect:
[CONT](RC):If your units boosted a total of three or more times this turn, this unit gets [Power]+5000.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Lianorn" in its card name, and your units boosted a total of five or more times this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1] & put this unit into soul], choose one of your rear-guards, and [Stand] it.
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS06] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 06: Master Deckset -Urara Haneyama-

name: Friendly Broccolly
effect:

name: Ethereal Cadence, Lagrace
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose a grade 3 card with "Lianorn" in its card name from your ride deck, and you may reveal it. If you revealed a card, or you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Lianorn" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Lianorn" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you did not put a card into hand, draw a card.
[CONT](RC)/(GC):If your back row has two or more grade 1 or less rear-guards, this unit gets "Boost" and [Power]+5000/[Shield]+5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS06] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 06: Master Deckset -Urara Haneyama-

name: Luster Impact Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your back row has two or more grade 1 or less rear-guards, this unit gets "Boost", and [Power]+5000. name: Rhythm of Joy, Elentis
effect:
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Lianorn" in its card name, this unit gets [Power]+2000. If your vanguard is in the UnisonDress state, it gets [Power]+5000 instead of +2000.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if your vanguard was boosted a total of three or more times this turn, [COST][retire this unit], draw a card, and if your damage zone has no face up cards, [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Concert of Many Emotions, Parsea
effect:

If you revealed a card, or your vanguard is in the UnisonDress state, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a card from your drop with a different card name from this unit and grade less than or equal to your vanguard, and call it to (RC).
[AUTO](RC):At the beginning of your main phase, if your vanguard is in the UnisonDress state, you may put this unit into soul.
productName: [VGE-DZ-SS06] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 06: Master Deckset -Urara Haneyama-
